title: 2021 Manufactured Home For Sale on Payment Plan

•	2021 Harmony Home – 14’ x 56’

Bold Properties is happy to offer this home available at Hidden Cove Manufactured Home Community in Bedford Heights, Ohio.
This home is being sold by the community operator.
Come BUY a home from us!
STOP wasting money on rent and INVEST in your future home.
We offer in house financing so when you are approved to move into the community, you are approved for financing!
Credit issues?
No problem.
We are only interested in your past renting/owning experience!
This home is for sale for $50,000 cash OR on a 10 year purchase plan.
Your monthly payment will be approximately $949.
To move in you will need to have a minimum of $5,705 which covers the 10% down payment, the security deposit, the first month lot rent, and the water connection fee.
Call Mia with any questions or to schedule a showing.
